resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108254</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108254</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207054</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Interactive Constitution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive Beschaffenheit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Constitution Interactive</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Constitution Interativo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Costituzione Interattiva</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικό σύνταγμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Constitución Interactiva</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">lets you search the Constitution and find relevant passages and explanations. Discover how the Constitution relates to more than 300 topics, from civil rights to school prayer, including Supreme Court decisions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">läßt Sie die Beschaffenheit suchen und relevante
Durchgänge und Erklärungen finden. Entdecken Sie, wie die 
Beschaffenheit auf mehr als 300 Themen, von den Zivilrechten, Gebet, 
einschließlich Gerichtentscheidungen zu schulen in Verbindung steht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vous laisse rechercher la constitution et trouver 
les passages et les explications appropriés. Découvrez comment
la constitution associe à plus de 300 sujets, des droits civiques 
d'instruire la prière, y compris des décisions de cour suprême.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">deixa-o procurarar o constitution e encontrar 
passagens e explanações relevantes. Descubra como o 
constitution se relaciona a mais de 300 tópicos, das direitas civis 
educar o prayer, including decisões da corte suprema.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">li lascia cercare la costituzione e trovare i 
passaggi e le spiegazioni relativi. Scopra come la costituzione 
si riferisce a più di 300 soggetti, dai diritti civili di istruire la
preghiera, compreso le decisioni della Corte suprema.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σας αφήνει να ψάξετε το σύνταγμα και να βρείτε τις 
σχετικές μεταβάσεις και τις εξηγήσεις. Ανακαλύψτε πώς το 
σύνταγμα αφορά περισσότερα από 300 θέματα, από τα αστικά 
δικαιώματα στη σχολική προσευχή, συμπεριλαμβανομένων των 
αποφάσεων ανώτατου δικαστηρίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">le deja buscar la constitución y encontrar pasos 
y explicaciones relevantes. Descubra cómo la constitución se 
relaciona con más de 300 asuntos, de las derechas civiles de enseñar
rezo, incluyendo decisiones del Tribunal Supremo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207054</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108254</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/interactive-constitution</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
